channel.title: Why cant people join my 508?
channel.description: hi guys my problem is i just got my 508 server to work and i want people to join but when my bro trys or i add to server status it says cant add you'r server is offline but it is online so please comment and help and i also port foward and i can go on it ?? :|

item.title: Why cant people join my 508?
item.dc:creator: @kidzcoder kidzcoder
item.description:
@kidzcoder wrote:

you need to go to no-ip.com
and dl the no-ip duc client
and then add a host
and the check the host on the client
and people should be able to connect

Read full topic
